website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few reports of inaccuracies, this is a decent combination square that comes at a price that's suitable for budget-minded do-it-yourselfers.
pros: Blade is made of solid stainless steel that's crafted to last
Measurement etchings are deep and fade-resistant, which makes them easy to read
cons: A few tools were off slightly from a 90 degree angle
Level bubble could be better, as it doesn't appear to be totally accurate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Value. Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an old Johnson that had rusted out just hanging in the garage and the square was plastic. I didn’t even realize how much of an upgrade this turned out to be. The ruler is stainless steel, the square is zinc and has a hardened scribe built into it. On top of all that it’s made in the USA. What a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: DIY DadTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Value, Regularly Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great U.S. made product, well constructed and durable in my use over the past few weeks in various household repairs. For the price, I characterize the value as excellent. The only downside is that I find the bubble level to be pretty much useless and I don't see why it's even included. The axis upon which the level works is based on the length of the black handle attachment...only 3-4 inches. It's difficult to determine levelness of anything substantial when the reference edge is so small. Just get rid of it!
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Good and square.
customer_reviews.text: 1st thing I did was check it for square and it is. fit and finish is good and tight. All the moving parts move easily enough with out being to easy. the measurements line up with other rulers I have.
customer_reviews.author: jerry d

customer_reviews.title: Received a defective tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a back-up to my old Stanley which has become hard to read due to a lot of use. For some reason the new Johnson Combination Square refuses to lock down when the locking screw is tightened. All so sliding the handle up and down the ruler is not as smooth as it should be. I’ve tried polishing the rule as well as lubricating the locking mechanism, but without improvement. It’s too late to return it, so I’m simply stuck with a defective Johnson combination square.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality & Value
customer_reviews.text: I know, why are you leaving a review for a Combination Square? Sure, the straight, 90 degree, and 45 degree lines are straight, 90 degrees, and 45 degrees. Well, here it is, the amazing quality and outstanding price warrant a review!
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Marty

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and 90 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Checked it with Japanese Mitutoyo for accuracy and confirmed it is 90 degrees. Very sturdy as well. Had it for couple of days so cannot say anything regarding durability Made in U.S.A.!!! AND cheaper then Chinese ones.
customer_reviews.author: livi

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The square i received is different from the one pictured. The one I got has both metric and inches. For the way I work, I need only inches on both sides of the ruler like the one shown in the picture. Also feels cheap. Should have bought a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: be improved
customer_reviews.text: The combo square worked out for some quick simple jobs in a pinch but it was not even 75% accurate. The level was not reliable and the square has play. If you are looking for professional grade, spend the extra $ and get a good combo square.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Z

customer_reviews.title: There are likely better tools out there
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing every day for imprecise work. But, if I want it to be perfectly square, I have to hold another square up to it while tightening. Still, it's taken my abuse and it still gets used. There are likely better tools out there, but I like beating up cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my tools
customer_reviews.text: Works great and holds measurements very well i would say that my favorite part is the scribe that comes inbeded makes it easy to mark your line
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice and heavy duty-Doesn't lock up very strong
customer_reviews.text: Accurate and sturdy feeling, definitely good value for money. However, the machining on the locking mechanism was a little wonky, and it doesn't like to lock up all the way. It will lock up tight enough to not move around too much, but just not as strong as I would prefer. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product come excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I am a contractor, and I did not expect this to be of as high quality as it really is. Very sturdy, very clean and accurate, and readable and fine lines on the ruler.
customer_reviews.author: Twee

customer_reviews.title: Spot on
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, I checked the 90 degrees angle against a square and using the lines on a flat surface. It was spot on. I also tested the cm/mm graduations against a digital caliper. Spot on again. It seems sturdy and well built. I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Rames

customer_reviews.title: Value combination square
customer_reviews.text: A basic combination square for a budget price. Well-made and durable. Great square to hang in your workworking shop.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ching

customer_reviews.title: Solid, accurate no wobble.
customer_reviews.text: No Wobble, it is tight and any square that will do that and is accurate gets five stars from me. I like it very much only wish I had bought the longer one.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Aronson

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool to have handy. Quality built and will get plenty of use. Happy to be able to support an American made product too.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good square
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Edges are kinda sharp. Had some manufacturing burr but nothing, too, serious.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Barraza

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was not at a true 90, it was off about 1 degree.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Elliott

customer_reviews.title: made in USA!
customer_reviews.text: tool is of high quality. feels great in the hand is is smooth to work with and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: pierre klee

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this level tool it is made very sturdy it's very easy to use and it is very accurate
customer_reviews.author: DAVE

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Mine was pretty much perfect out of the box. Slide was true. Square was square as I can detect. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter McGavin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made, sturdy tool, and is very accurate. It is also USA made, which is nice for a change.
customer_reviews.author: Archangel1Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and couldn't be happier. Much better than the plastic one I was using and couldn't read anymore. Found both to be square and accurate
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles.
customer_reviews.text: Well, its cheap price is what you get. The screw tightened all the way and the square still wobbled. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Pennywise

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The knob is hard to turn. It looks like it has over spray in the threads
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these types of squares, but it was becoming very shaky, so I decided to buy one of these. The quality of this product superseded all expectations! Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Will-I

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and high quality. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ER Nurse

customer_reviews.title: surprising quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of this tool.heavy duty construction make this tool a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: squirrel man

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I've been working for so many years without this
customer_reviews.text: If you do any sort of wood work, you need this square/ruler. I can't believe I spent to many years trying to make precise measurements with a huge tape measure.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: I had an old square that I could barely read so I got this one to replace it. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: bluejay1959

customer_reviews.title: Accurate,  easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's accurate when measured with my micrometer. Easy to flip around for metric use
customer_reviews.author: conradpuck

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA!
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA! This product is well made & performs quite well. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AndoD

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: use it everyday since i purchased it. Stays in my hands!
customer_reviews.author: Jaese

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel, can't beat it
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel, can't beat it. The old one I have has rusted out in the garage. That's why I chose this one for the workshop.
customer_reviews.author: norme name

customer_reviews.title: not made with pin point precision but certainly good enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fairly ordinary, not made with pin point precision but certainly good enough for the price. This is one of the most useful measuring tools you can have.
customer_reviews.author: David Consoer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Slide doesn't even lock in place. Poorly built. Don't buy. I returned it on the spot.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: 90 and 45 degrees are accurate, item feels strong and sturdy! Didn't give 5 stars only because scriber arrived broken (see image) so it cannot be used :(
customer_reviews.author: Chen

customer_reviews.title: a good tool
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. The engraving on the ruler is a bit light for my tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Irrgang

customer_reviews.title: Ruler was bent
customer_reviews.text: The ruler was bent so I can't even use it. Returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Stainless Steel square at a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great Stainless Steel square at a very good price. Complete with Bubble Level and Scribe in handle.
customer_reviews.author: TWA-SJU

customer_reviews.title: Lack Finishing
customer_reviews.text: The product is sold and well made, but it is lacking finishing. The edges of the scale are very sharp and uncomfortable to hold and one has to be careful not to hurt himself.
customer_reviews.author: syedahmed

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Good square. Nice and accurate. Sturdy as hell. Definitely worth the money. You won’t be disappointed. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Webster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, well made and durable. Unfortunately mine came up missing at work but I do plan to replace it with this same one.
customer_reviews.author: TommyT

customer_reviews.title: Come precise right out of the box. His square ...
customer_reviews.text: Come precise right out of the box. His square has some sharp edges though and it heavy for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: William Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. I found it to be square and accurate to other calibrated tools.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chavez

customer_reviews.title: It's OK.
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok but there are other brands that are better. I'd rate this middle of the road.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

product_meta.title: Johnson Level & Tool 400EM-S 12-Inch Metal Combination Square
product_meta.description:
Johnson Level & Tool 400EM-S 12-Inch Metal Combination Square

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Cast zinc head with computer-machined gauging edges for greater accuracy. Acrylic yellow barrel vial. Hardened, removable scriber. Steel blade with protective anti-rust coating is permanently stamped in 1/8ths, 1/16ths, and 1/32nds.
feature_bullets: Steel blade with permanently stamped graduations 1/8", 1/16", 1/32" (mm on 400EM)
Heavy-duty cast zinc head with black, chip-resistant e-coating finish
CNC machined square head for greater accuracy

1 Year Warranty: Johnson Level warrants this product against defects in material and workmanship for one year after the confirmed purchase date. At its option, the company will replace or repair the product if it fails under normal use.

specifications.Warranty Description: 1 Year Warranty: Johnson Level warrants this product against defects in material and workmanship for one year after the confirmed purchase date. At its option, the company will replace or repair the product if it fails under normal use.
